name: Small Business Credit Card
shortDescription: Small business credit card is for start-ups, medium-sized business or a sole proprietor’s looking to build up their business’s credit record.
extraInfoLine: The Nedbank Small Business credit card provides a cost-effective and flexible payment solution to for your everyday business expenses.
extraFeatureTextLine: Enjoy privilege and prestige with the American Express Platinum Credit Card that offers a variety of exclusive features and added benefits.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;
a minimum turnover of R150 000 or more.

salesHighlights: Swipe and earn through the Nedbank Greenbacks rewards programme
Create efficiencies and control through visibility for all business expenditure
Peace of mind through free purchase protection ie. Fraud.
valueAddedServices: 5% discount on the AVIS SME rate and Daily rate
Up to 4 complimentary visits to the Bidvest lounges
Automatic basic travel insurance with top-up options for comprehensive travel insurance
Cards are contactless-enabled – just tap and go
Clients receive two cards but receive one statement – meaning less paperwork.
No transaction fees are incurred when using the credit card at retailers.

Choose from three repayment options:: pay a minimum of 5% of the total statement balance
pay the full outstanding amount at the statement due date, which allows you to benefit from up to 55 days interest-free credit

productFeatures.name: repayment
productFeatures.description: For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months.

productFeatures.name: earnrate
productFeatures.description: 2 Greenbacks for every R5.00 on Amex card, 1 Greenback for every R5.00 spend on MasterCard card

productFeatures.name: travelservicesdesk
productFeatures.description: Online Nedbank Travel Portal with exclusive offers
